app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/article/10.3390/nano11040907/s1, Figure S1: NiO XRR pattern, Figure S2: NCO-5/1 XRR pattern, Figure S3: NCO-3/1 XRR pattern, Figure S4: NCO-1/1 XRR pattern, Figure S5: CoO XRR pattern, Figure S6: Cyclic voltammetry curves of NCO-1/1 sample in 0.08â€“3.00 V range, Figure S7: SEM image of NCO-5/1 thin film at 200 kX magnification, after CV (205 cycles), Figure S8: SEM image of NCO-5/1 thin film at 97.6 kX magnification, above figure 1 area after 24 s.
